import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import PaletteNavbar from './PaletteNavbar' import chroma from 'chroma-js' // import { scaleThreshold } from 'd3-scale'; class PaletteShades extends Component { render(){ const originalColor = this.props.color.color; const lighter = chroma(originalColor).brighten(1).hex(); const lightest = chroma(originalColor).luminance(0.9).hex() const darkest = chroma(originalColor).darken(4).hex() return(
